comment: Been reminiscing about 'Beverly Hillbillies' all say...Donna Douglas was "Elly May until the day she died"
amr:
# ::snt Been reminiscing about 'Beverly Hillbillies' all say...Donna Douglas was "Elly May until the day she died"
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / reminisce-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s / say-01
                  :ARG0 (a / all)
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Beverly"
                              :op2 "Hillbillies"))))
      :snt2 s
      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Donna"
                  :op2 "Douglas"))
      :ARG1 (p3 / person
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Elly"
                  :op2 "May")
            :domain p2
            :time (u / until
                  :op1 (d / day
                        :time-of (d2 / die-01
                              :ARG1 p3)))))

# ::snt R.I.P. Elly May! GB
(m / multi-sentence

            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "R.I.P."))
      :snt2 (p2 / person
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Elly"
                  :op2 "May")))

# ::snt RIP Elly May.
(w / wish-01
      :ARG1 (r / rest-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Elly"
                        :op2 "May"))
            :manner (p2 / peace)))
